Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Gen Ai doesnt know the content as well without a long explination in the prompt of the question so its answers are very general

Question 41.Response: I didnt trust the Ai as much as it feels like no matter what i write it gives a similar response.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Teachers are hard to ask follow up questions as this correspondance can take days and feel like pestering whereas you can have long technical conversations with AI
